name: Meyers Leonard
description:
Who is Meyers Leonard? 

A: Meyers Leonard is a young, hotshot lawyer. Heir to the Dershowitz throne. He's currently defending the Skelos family against corruption charges in Albany, NY. 

B: Meyers Leonard is a non-Jewish basketball player for the Portland Trailblazers. He's mostly just a bench guy, but he had a big game against the Grizzlies in this year's playoffs. 

C: Meyers Leonard is a Yeshiva graduate and an exciting entrepreneur. His innovations in social media will soon make him one of the richest men on the planet. He is currently in negotiations to replace Mark Cuban on ABC's hit program Shark Tank.

Yeah. We would never have guessed "B" either.

(Editor's update, March 9, 2021: Definitely Not a Jew!)
